thread.section_title: Hotel Hor - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location and friendly staff.
thread.title_full: Excellent location and friendly staff. - Review of Hotel Hor, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nanneke
title: Excellent location and friendly staff.
text:
Inevitably smallish rooms but quiet when facing inside onto the patio. The staff were all excellent and rooms comfortable and good heating control. The breakfast is worth having and the hotel generally efficient and relaxing.
Room Tip: quieter rooms face inside. Gare Nord is noisy! See more room tips
